user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Design Details

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the full brief and any reference materials you have for the cover of Clara Bellamy’s “Whispers of the Past”? You mentioned that the information is available in your Notion workspace—feel free to pull anything relevant from there.

You can email the files or links directly to me at ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com. Receiving the details this week would help me stay on schedule for initial concepts.

Thank you so much, and let me know if there’s anything else you need from me.

Best regards,

Ethan

final_output:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Design Details

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the full brief and any reference materials you have for the cover of Clara Bellamy’s “Whispers of the Past”? You mentioned that the information is available in your Notion workspace—feel free to pull anything relevant from there.

You can email the files or links directly to me at ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com. Receiving the details this week would help me stay on schedule for initial concepts.

Thank you so much, and let me know if there’s anything else you need from me.

Best regards,

Ethan
